# {{non-gloss definition|Onomatopoeia (sound of sudden consecutive collisions, e.g. gun shots, door pounding, child running around, ping pong ball match)}}
#: {{zh-x|值 此 天寒地凍 之 時，戰爭 依然 沒有 消停，雙方 依舊 '''乒乒乓乓'''，爆炸聲 此起彼伏，不絕於耳！|At this time, when the weather is cold and ground is frozen, the war still has not ceased. The two sides are still '''banging away''' at each other; sounds of explosion are heard one after another, never stopping in the ears.|ref='''2014''', [http://www.military-china.cn/web/web/15370.html 进一退二俄罗斯摆脱乌克兰危机的绝佳招法]}}
